headline: A Splashy Start to Prohibition, 100 Not-So-Dry Januaries Ago
abstract: In 1920, Prohibition went into effect, but America partied on.
lead_paragraph: As the sun rose this morning on a new year, bleary-eyed people across the United States poured out their half-drunk champagne bottles, gathered up their empty beer cans and turned to Twitter to share their resolution with the world.
